title: Early Childhood Education and Foundational Degree Programs: Practice-Centered Instructional Design for Higher Learning Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational job experience related to early childhood education and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: An activity-centered education program for current practitioners balancing work and learning, reflecting real workplace cases. Features collaboration and resource sharing using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply early childhood development theories to mathematical analysis (e.g., statistics, data visualization) to solve problems in educational settings.
Learners can design early childhood education programs using mathematical modeling techniques through team-based projects.
Learners can create portfolios to measure mathematical thinking using assessment tools and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
